lead_paragraph: As part of a 2013 exhibition, artists plastered a portrait on the side of gallery in Chelsea. Over two and a half years, the figure began to disappear behind construction.

headline.main: A Mural Fades From a City Canvas

snippet: As part of a 2013 exhibition, artists plastered a portrait on the side of gallery in Chelsea. Over two and a half years, the figure began to disappear behind construction....
abstract: Photographer Rivka S Katvan documents how building construction project slowly hid portrait of Cuban revolution survivor painted by Jose Parla and street artist JR on gallery wall in Chelsea neighborhood of Manhattan.
